mapper.select: select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * (select count(1) from T_EQUIPMENT where EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '110201' and MAJOR_CODE = '11')), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.MAJOR_CODE = '11' and a.EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '110201') t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH

select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * (select count(1) from T_EQUIPMENT where EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '110203' and MAJOR_CODE = '11')), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.MAJOR_CODE = '11' and a.EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '110203') t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH

select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * (select count(1) from T_EQUIPMENT where EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '020102' and MAJOR_CODE = '02')), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.MAJOR_CODE = '02' and a.EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '020102') t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH

select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * (select count(1) from T_EQUIPMENT where EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '020101' and MAJOR_CODE = '02')), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.MAJOR_CODE = '02' and a.EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '020101') t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH

select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * to_number((select count(1) from T_BOM where ENAME like 'B0117%' and ENAME not in ('B01170137', 'B01170104', 'B01170105', 'B01170304', 'B01170305', 'B01170337'))) * 18), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and a.MAJOR_CODE = '07' and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.FAULT_MODULE_ID in (select tt.ENAME from T_BOM tt where ENAME like 'B0117%' and ENAME not in ('B01170137', 'B01170104', 'B01170105', 'B01170304', 'B01170305', 'B01170337'))) t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH

select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * (select count(1) from T_EQUIPMENT where EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '080804' and MAJOR_CODE = '08')), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.MAJOR_CODE = '08' and a.EQUIP_TYPE_CODE = '080804') t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH

select c.YEAR_MONTH as "yearMonth", ( (1 - (round((sum( (case when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) < c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(TO_DATE(t.CLOSE_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) when substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) = c.YEAR_MONTH and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) > c.YEAR_MONTH then round(TO_NUMBER(add_months( TO_DATE(c.YEAR_MONTH || '-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 1) - TO_DATE(t.FILLIN_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) * 24) else 0 end)) ) / (to_number(to_char(last_day(to_date(c.YEAR_MONTH, 'YYYY-MM')), 'dd')) * 24 * (select count(1) from T_EQUIPMENT where SYSTEM_CODE = '1002' and MAJOR_CODE = '10')), 4))) * 100 ) as "precent" from (select a.FAULT_NO, a.FILLIN_TIME, (select max(b.CLOSE_TIME) from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO) as CLOSE_TIME from T_FAULT_INFO a where not exists(select 1 from T_FAULT_ORDER b where a.FAULT_NO = b.FAULT_NO and b.ORDER_STATUS <> '70') and rtrim(a.FAULT_FLAG) is null and a.MAJOR_CODE = '10' and a.SYSTEM_CODE = '1002') t, (select to_char(add_months(to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), rownum - 1), 'YYYY-MM') as YEAR_MONTH from dual connect by rownum <= months_between(to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM'), to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM')) + 1) c where (substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.FILLIN_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) or (substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) >= #{startTime} and substr(t.CLOSE_TIME, 1, 7) <= #{endTime}) group by c.YEAR_MONTH order by c.YEAR_MONTH
